app.name: SwapDRC Lite
app.short_description: Switch TV display onto the gamepad
app.long_description:
Switch Display, Audio, and Gamepad Sensor Bar: - Press the TV button.
Switch on/off Gamepad LCD: - Press and hold R-Stick for 3-6 seconds.
Special thanks to: Maschell, dimok, NWPlayer123, Brienj, and BKOOL999.
